name: Monster Coffeeshop
description:
What do you get when you combine visual novel, cool characters, coffeeshop, and chill beats?

Relax as you pop ingredients, serve customers, and listen to your troubled monster customers in your newly opened Monster Coffeeshop! Fill up your journal with new recipes and things you learn about your customers. Discover your customers' favorite drinks and unlock new dialogue events with them!

  • Tap on customers to talk to them, listen to their story, and form deeper bonds. 
  • Pop ingredients floating across the screen to create drinks to serve to your customers. 
  • Drag the created drink to a customer to serve.

If you are excited about Monster Coffeeshop, please support us! We are a small duo of game developers, so we really appreciate it.

This game is in development. As of date, discover up to 30 unique recipes and 3 unique customers.

*Warning* Data will not be saved when you close the game.

Developers:

  • Lucid Shiba - Game Design, Character/BG Art, Narrative, Programming
  • CrazyCaryz - Game Design, UI/Food Art, Sound Design
